div.div: Risk maps for aflatoxin contamination in wheat at harvest in 3 different climate scenarios, present, +2 °C, +5 °C.
div.p: Mean daily data used as input result from 100-year run of the predictive model AFLA-maize in 2254 geo-referenced points throughout Europe, in the 3 scenarios (present (a), +2°C (b), +5°C (c)). The scale 0–200 refers to the aflatoxin risk index (AFI), output from the predictive model; increasing the number, the risk of contamination increases. Maps generated using Mathworks, Matlab. Computer Program, 2012 http://it.mathworks.com/.
